ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Re: Fetch process
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Artem, I am not sure why you have the following decide rule sequence: 1) Accept OnHostsDecideRule 2) Then you reject OnHostsDecideRule. I am not sure what

Hi Artem,

I am not sure why you have the following decide rule sequence:

1) Accept OnHostsDecideRule
2) Then you reject OnHostsDecideRule. I am not sure what you are trying 
to do here.
3) Accept OnDomainsDecideRule - what is you scope? Do you want to crawl 
in domain or host scope?
3) Again you reject tOnDomainsDecideRule.

>      > Thanks a lot for help.
>      > I've added ContentTypeRegExFilter to the 'midfetch-filter' and
>      > 'write-processors' sections, and now only html/text contents are
>      > saved into the ARC file.
>      >
>      > The one problem I couldn't solve is to accept only URIs that end
>      > with the specified pattern (for example, ".doc, *.ppt").

What are you trying to do? You want to allow (fetch and process) only 
.doc and .ppt, but save only html/text to ARC files.

Take care,
i.
